https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6vbtM6hyuRUWuxpyOi1XCx5mfl.jpg Benny, 14, is a teenager whose well-to-do parents are absent most of the time. He fills this void by immersing himself in the world of video. Soon, the pictures he feeds on are overshadowing his sense of reality until Benny loses his mind. He films himself committing an unspeakable act of violence. Benny's Video
